Class CopierSystemImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • CopierSystemImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CopierSystem

    public class CopierSystemImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements CopierSystem
    CopierSystemImplementattion is the main class of the Copier System application. It implements the CopierSystem interface which provides the class with a range of methods.
    Version:
    Task4
    Author:
    Benjamin Scabbia

        public void addPlainCopier(java.lang.String id,
                           double pageCost,
                           double costSetup,
                           int copySpeed)
        Allows a plain copier to be added to the system.
        Specified by:
        addPlainCopier in interface CopierSystem
        Parameters:
        id - represents the identifier of the copier
        pageCost - is the cost of a page in pence
        costSetup - is the set up cost for a job in pence
        copySpeed - is the speed of the copier

                            double pageCost,
                            int copySpeed,
                            int maxJobSize)
        Allows a colour copier to be added to the system.
        Specified by:
        addColourCopier in interface CopierSystem
        Parameters:
        id - represents the identifier of the copier
        pageCost - is the cost of a page in pence
        copySpeed - is the speed of the copier
        maxJobSize - is the maximum permitted job size in physical pages

      • addHQCopier

        public void addHQCopier(java.lang.String id,
                        double sheetCost,
                        double monochromeCost,
                        double colourCost,
                        double hQPremium,
                        double costSetup,
                        int copySpeed)
        Allows a high-quality copier to be added to the system.
        Specified by:
        addHQCopier in interface CopierSystem
        Parameters:
        id - represents the identifier of the copier
        sheetCost - is the cost of a single sheet in pence
        monochromeCost - is the cost supplement for a monochrome page
        colourCost - is the cost supplement for a colour page
        hQPremium - is the cost supplement for high-quality (per sheet)
        costSetup - is the set up cost for a job in pence
        copySpeed - is the speed of the copier

      • addJob

        public int addJob(java.lang.String cust,
                  int copies,
                  int pages,
                  boolean isColour,
                  boolean isHQuality,
                  boolean isDSided)
        Adds a job to the job list. This method assumes that all jobs submitted are runnable (i.e. that at last one suitable copier exists. The added job is given the state "waiting".
        Specified by:
        addJob in interface CopierSystem
        Parameters:
        cust - is the name of the customer
        copies - is the number of copies required
        pages - is the number of pages in the document
        isColour - indicates whether colour is required or not
        isHQuality - indicates whether high quality is required or not
        isDSided - indicates whether double-sided is required or not
        Returns:
        returns the id assigned to the job

      • scheduleJobs

        public void scheduleJobs()
        Schedule jobs. This method inspects all the waiting jobs and sets them printing where possible.
        Specified by:
        scheduleJobs in interface CopierSystem

        Returns:
        returns an array of the id's of all of the copiers

      • isCopier

        public boolean isCopier(java.lang.String id)
        Returns true if the copier with the identifier can be found in the system, false otherwise.
        Specified by:
        isCopier in interface CopierSystem
        Parameters:
        id - represents the identifier of the copier
        Returns:
        returns true if and only if the copier with the identifier can be found, false otherwise.

      • getCopierDetails

        public java.lang.String getCopierDetails(java.lang.String id)

        Specified by:
        getCopierDetails in interface CopierSystem
        Parameters:
        id - represents the identifier of the copier
        Returns:

      • getAllJobs

        public java.lang.String[] getAllJobs()
        Provides an array of String representation of all jobs. Job fields within records are space delimited and the id field is given first
        Specified by:
        getAllJobs in interface CopierSystem
        Returns:
        returns an array of String representation of all jobs

      • getJobsWaiting

        public java.lang.String[] getJobsWaiting()
        Provides an array of String representation of all jobs which are waiting for printing. Job fields within records are space delimited and the id field is given first.
        Specified by:
        getJobsWaiting in interface CopierSystem
        Returns:
        returns an array of String representation of all jobs which are waiting for printing

      • getJobStatus

        public int getJobStatus(int jNo)
        Get the status of the specified job.
        Specified by:
        getJobStatus in interface CopierSystem
        Parameters:
        jNo - is the number of the job
        Returns:
        returns the status of the job as CopierSystem.WAITING = 0, CopierSystem.PRINTING = 1, or CopierSystem.DONE = 2
